entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
